name: Wei Gao 0008
content: Wei Gao's HomePage@LAMDA Wei Gao Ph.D. Professor LAMDA Group School of Artificial Intelligence Nanjing University , Nanjing, China Email: gaow(at)nju(dot)edu(dot)cn Sections: [ Biography ] [ Research Interest ] [ Publication ] Biogeraphy Currently I am a Professor of School of Artificial Intelligence in Nanjing University and a member of LAMDA Group, led by professor Zhi-Hua Zhou. Before that, I received my M.Sc. degree in the Center for Combinatorics, Nankai University in June 2009 and I received my Ph.D. degree from Nanjing University in June 2014.
